timeline.message: Add versioning support in listObjects API
Add versioning support in listObjects API

Run MinIO server in distributed mode for functional tests.

This enables to run almost all functional tests for verification.

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
public abstract List<Item> contents();
protected <T extends Item> List<T> emptyIfNull(List<T> lst) {
return Collections.unmodifiableList(MoreObjects.firstNonNull(lst, new LinkedList<T>()));
}
public abstract List<Item> contents();

I suggest adding a generic method emptyIfNull(), which can then be called from the subclass implementations of contents(). Note that the return type of the implementations will have to change to the concrete types with this. e.g. List<Contents> and List<Version>
timeline.author: anjalshireesh

timeline.body: Add the `@Override` annotation, and change the implementation to call `emptyIfNull()` if you accept my suggestion in `ListObjectsResult`

timeline.message:
Add method to return empty list if null

Added in the base class `ListObjectsResult` so that the implementations
of `contents()` in subclasses can be simplified.
